EmailTemplate.description: This email template is used to Notify Vineti To Reschedule Order for new Apheresis Pickup Date
EmailTemplate.name: Notify Vineti To Update Confirmed Drug Product Delivery Date Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmed Drug Product Delivery Date to be updated in Vineti
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear V2V Manager, The confirmed Drug Product Delivery Date has been received for Order {!Order.Id} from the site.
Request you to please update this in Vineti. Order
Regards, CCM Operations Coordinator
